name: Air Fryer Salt and Vinegar Fries for One
author: Buckwheat Queen
summary: When you're home alone and don't want to run to the store or grab takeout, you can still have crispy fries with that salt and vinegar kick. You can double this recipe if you're in the mood for more.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Peel potato and cut lengthwise into 1/2-inch sticks
Rinse potato sticks under cold running water for a few seconds
Add vinegar and just enough water to cover the potatoes
Preheat the air fryer to 320 degrees F (160 degrees C)
Drain and pat the potatoes dry
Toss with oil, salt, and pepper in a bowl and transfer to the air fryer basket
Cook in the preheated air fryer until soft but not browned, about 16 minutes
Shake the basket and raise the temperature to 355 degrees F (180 degrees C)
Air fry for 6 minutes, shake, and check for doneness
Cook until outsides of fries are crispy and browned, about 6 minutes more
Taste and adjust salt before serving
